text: I’ve started watching the tutorial on OSF that Liz shared ^^ I’ve been using it a bit already, but just on the go, and there’s probably many more handy functions to know of (e.g. integration with other tools/programs)! I’ve also looked into sharing my unpublished manuscript as a preprint on MedRxiv, though I guess that is less part of project workflow.. :slightly_smiling_face:
